description: Running is all about your feet pounding the pavement, so anything you can do to help ease up on that pressure can make your endeavor that much more enjoyable. That’s where their Athlete Edition Run Crew Socks come in. With their 4 Degree™ Elite fit system, mesh zones for added breathability, and a Virtually Seamless™ toe, this sock brings the comfort. So whether you’re on mile 1 or mile 20, you can focus on the run and not your feet.
name: Smartwool Trail Run Targeted Cushion Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 29% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane
